concept.title: GUIApp: GUI Application with C Engine

section.title: Download
section.p: Click on the following link to download the example: GUIApp.zip
Click: browse to view the example code.

section.title: Description
section.p: GUIApp is an example of an GUI application whose engine is written in C.

The engine is a DLL, produced by project GUIAppEng.mmp, was taken from the FreeBSD cksum (checksum) utility. The only code in the project which was not written in C is the following function, defined in file GUIAppEng.cpp:
This fulfils the requirement that all DLLs need an entry point called E32Dll().

section.title: Usage
section.p: The program is operated using the following commands on the File menu:

li.p: Calculate Checksum... brings up a file selection dialog. Select a file and the program will calculate and show the file's checksum.
View Checksums... shows a list of all the files which have been selected, and their checksums.
